titleStmt.title: A Thirde and last mape, both of the Sedg of Breda by Spinola and how the Princ of Orage hath enguarterde his forces as allso in what forme and place the forver English corroneller, hath emcampet them selues by ther crimes, with the last procedings.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Thomas Archer, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes head Alley, ouer against the signe of the Horse-Shoe,

notesStmt.note: Title taken from top left corner.
Title over text: The last description of the siege of Breda, which is now environed by the forces of the King of Spaine, vnder the command of the Marquesse Spinola.
Date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Popes head Alley, ouer against the signe of the Horse-Shoe
